channel.title: UX: Select favourite data source automatically instead of alphabetically
channel.description: When you start a query in V10 beta, the data source is selected alphabetically. My most-used data source is at the bottom of the list, so I end up having to scroll to the bottom every time (1-30 times a day) I create a query. Small quality-of-life improvement.

item.title: UX: Select favourite data source automatically instead of alphabetically
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
This seems like an easy win. Great idea!

Read full topic
item.source: UX: Select favourite data source automatically instead of alphabetically
